lead_paragraph: Though Ms. Streep is a longtime advocate of women, the Democratic convention was a political coming-out of sorts: deeply personal, openly partisan and nationally televised.

headline.main: Why She Screamed: Meryl Streep’s Complex Bond With Hillary Clinton

snippet: Though Ms. Streep is a longtime advocate of women, the Democratic convention was a political coming-out of sorts: deeply personal, openly partisan and nationally televised....
